author: Jimmy Crasto
comment: Finally the app made it possible to sync music on phone to smart wear like the watch is itself bcum an MP3 player gr8. But it dosent play music on phone or in earphones. So need to keep two apps for music. So cheers for the work. I got LG G WATCH so it syncs well with the phone. I will give 5 star if able to shuffle or view playlist on Android wear. So make the nxt update interesting. Thanks.
title: The most wanted APP

author: Paul Robin Hidalgo
comment: Must have app for runners who listen to music while on a run but don't want the extra bulk of a phone. Prefect companion for Sony smart watch 3 and offline GPS running app
title: Excellent app

author: Cody Fontaine
comment: *Update - I wish the icons were prettier or themeable.                                        Great for a quick workout list without messing with the lacking google music sync.
title: Sweet

author: Damon Lee
comment: A much needed app! Not the prettiest but does the job.

author: Rishab Mehta
comment: Few bugs that are important to be taken care of 1) at times deletes all the songs on the wear 2) glitches 3) creates a duplicate in the mobile phone of all the media 4) can have a better interface and options to select

author: Sandeep K Sinha
comment: Have given a five star in hope of a playlist. Finally the alternate of google play music has come. Well done guys, its pretty stable and easy to use.

author: James Miller
comment: File transfer is a hot mess.  No shuffle play.

author: Aamir Akthar
comment: Should add songs list for faster search. Playlist option nd appear as card on main screen.
title: Good but not the best

author: Frankie Fok
comment: This app can upload music to my Moto360 without google play music, brilliant. Finally can play offline music with my watch.
title: Can upload music to my Moto360 finally

author: hao liu
comment: best choice for the users who cannot use Google music service in their country.

author: Gonen I
comment: 5 stars just for providing a solution for playing offline music on an android wear smartwatch for those living in a country where Google Play doesn't enable downloading to the watch. Super simple player without many features, but it simply works!
title: Thanks for providing this solution
